original_title: 99.4％が女子！の学校に入学したらクラスメイトは女子ばかりでモテまくり！休み時間、授業中関係なく誘惑されまくりでヤラレまくり！楽しいやら…
overview: 99.4% are girls! When I Entered School, My Classmates Are All Girls And I'm Popular! A classmate girl who aims at Ji Po regardless of break time or class. At first, I thought I was lucky, but I was able to get an erection all the time while I was at school. I'm honestly sick. But their libido is bottomless. I don't have time to study at all! Intense sex! It is a Yarre Chin state that is not Yarichin. It's fun, it's sad, it feels good, it's a mix of various emotions...
title: 99.4% Are Girls! When I Entered School, My Classmates Are All Girls And I'm Popular! Break Time, No Matter During Class, I'm Tempted And I'm Going To Have A Good Time! Have Fun…
